summary: Behold! An ancient cults sacred armor has been reforged, Craft-able and powerful, It wields the powers of the Children of Akatosh.
descriptionHtml:
Now Updated: New Model for Female version, and Lowed Stats for less overpowerment and changed some Enchants.
No Version yet for non enchanted yet but will start on it soon along with Sword and Shield Crafting at the Skyforge... Have Fun and Remember to Endorse :)

Craft-able only at Skyforge in Whiterun.

The Texture for the Nordic Steel is not mine Nor is it included in this download, you can find it here at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20792.
This Texture is made by Cabal120, I suggest you get his texture, they\'re very beautiful and I will download any that he uploads.
If you download My armor His texture will not show up only the Vanilla one, but if you already have his textures then good for you :) Please endorse Him, His textures take lots of hard work and patient time.
Please endorse me as-well, I\'m fairly new to the Mod scene and wish to get one of my mods into the hot mods list.

There is a Female version and Male Version though for both of them i have been having difficulties with the Weight paint for the lower dragon bone armor piece for both male and female armors, I will gladly Add to the credit list whoever can fix that issue for me first. thank you for reading :)

[youtube]pYAi0MxXMeM[/youtube]
author: Me
